name: Television News
description: This course focuses on advanced multiplatform video journalism. Students learn how to shoot, edit and package editorial content. Students also staff live-to-air news programs where they anchor the news, sports, weather and entertainment. This course is taught at Centennial College and is open only to students in the Journalism Joint Program.
prerequisites: 14.5 credits, including JOUB03H3 & JOUB05H3 & JOUB10H3 & JOUB17H3 & [(JOUB09H3) or JOUB20H3]
